titles.title: Mental Health Telemedicine Expansion Act
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage under the Medicare program of certain mental health telehealth services.
Mental Health Telemedicine Expansion Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Mental Health Telemedicine Expansion Act
This bill excludes certain mental health telehealth services from specified requirements under Medicare, including originating site requirements.
